tool_description: Aggregates and analyzes customer reviews for bathroom fixtures from multiple sources to provide actionable insights.

product_ids.description: List of product IDs to aggregate reviews for

minimum_reviews.description: Minimum number of reviews required for inclusion (1-50)

error_messages: Insufficient reviews: One or more products have fewer reviews than the specified minimum
Invalid minimum_reviews: Must be between 1 and 50
Review data unavailable: Unable to access review data for some products
usage: Provide product_ids to analyze customer feedback. Set minimum_reviews threshold for data reliability and enable sentiment_analysis for deeper insights.

average_ratings.description: Array of average customer ratings from 1-5 stars for each product

review_counts.description: Array of total review counts for each product

common_praises.description: Array of most frequently praised aspects for each product

common_complaints.description: Array of most common complaints for each product

sentiment_scores.description: Array of sentiment scores from -1 to 1 for each product
